# scm_hip_object (Data Source)

HipObjects data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up a single HIP Profile by its ID.
data "scm_hip_object" "scm_hip_object_ds" {
  id = "aba16b3c-8d43-4bac-aa76-572f1d36dbc5"
}

# Output the details of the single HIP Profile object found.
output "hip_objects_ds_result" {
  description = "The details of the specific HIP Object."
  value       = data.scm_hip_object.scm_hip_object_ds
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

- `id` (String) UUID of the resource

- `name` (String) The name of the HIP object

- `is_enabled` (String) is enabled
- `is_installed` (Boolean) Is Installed
- `missing_patches` (Attributes) Missing patches (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--patch_management--criteria--missing_patches))

<a id="nestedatt--patch_management--criteria--missing_patches"></a>
### Nested Schema for `patch_management.criteria.missing_patches`

Read-Only:

- `check` (String) Check
- `patches` (List of String) Patches
- `severity` (Attributes) Severity (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--patch_management--criteria--missing_patches--severity))

<a id="nestedatt--patch_management--criteria--missing_patches--severity"></a>
### Nested Schema for `patch_management.criteria.missing_patches.severity`

Read-Only:

- `greater_equal` (Number) Greater equal
- `greater_than` (Number) Greater than
- `is` (Number) Is
- `is_not` (Number) Is not
- `less_equal` (Number) Less equal
- `less_than` (Number) Less than




<a id="nestedatt--patch_management--vendor"></a>
### Nested Schema for `patch_management.vendor`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) Name
- `product` (List of String) Product name
